passes.help: Headings should not be empty

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

passes.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
passes.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

none.message: Form field does not have multiple label elements

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(10) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(10) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(10) > div > div > aside:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(4) > h3:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
